data.text: I got to experience the whole of the airport and with its many store and the customer service was too pushy but at Sleep‚Äôn fly, the staff was excellent, the customer service was outstanding, excellent and perfect!! The service was serving! Their smile and their jokes were so shiny..I‚Äôll come back  and recommend 100%
data.title: Best staff ever

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:

owner_response.author: Rebecca S

data.text: Location is very convenient, i have a whole day in the airport so lots of hours involved, i ddnt wanna sit down at the gates. I saw online about this place and wanted to check it out, I met Ronie Elgin and he was very welcoming! A++ employee, very helpful and accomodating. I paid for 12hrs stay and with shower and it feels so food. The bed was comfy and clean, the towel was pristine. Note no toilet inside have to use airport toilet but its good (they have bidet!) all in all highly recommended!
data.title: Sleep n fly Dubai Terminal 1 is awesome üëèüèª üòç thanks to Ronie!

owner_response.author: Rebecca S

data.text:
The hotel was a lifesaver after a redeye flight. While their online booking system only allows to book stays beginning 2 hours from the current time, the walk in bookings are available and cost the same.

One standout aspect of my stay was the exceptional service provided by Ronie Elgin. He was extremely friendly and easy to communicate to, even when I had only 2 brain cells left after my flight. Huge thanks to Ronie for patiently answering all my questions, and being such a welcoming host!
data.title: Perfect for a pre flight nap. Exceptional staff!

We will share your feedback with the name mentioned above.

Best regards,

The Lounge Team

data.text:
I am so happy that I booked sleep n fly for my 12h overstay to a connection flight. Definitely recommend! 
Great service guys . Keep going, special thanks to Mr. Kristospher at Reception desk. Great job.
data.title: I am glad I chose them for my 12h overstay at Dubai airport!

owner_response.author: Rebecca S

data.text: This was a lifesaver for me while at an extra long layover in Dubai. I have a serious back injury from a fracture and so needed to rest and the bed was super comfortable. The room was well thought out and offered all I needed for the short and much needed rest. The customer service, cleanliness, safety and convenience were really worth mentioning and this is a great option for anyone who is there for some hours but no long enough to warrant a hotel. The shower was super clean with fluffy towels and I felt rested and refreshed for the second leg of my journey! Thank you.
data.title: Highly recommended!
